name: Trinkets
description: The $(l:amethyst_imbuement:altars/imbuing_table)Imbuing Table$() has the ability to enchant certain curios with magic that offer all sorts of positive effects... even protection from death. Read on to get started with such magical trinkets:$(li)$(l:amethyst_imbuement:starter_guide/jewelry_guide)Jewelry$()$(li)$(l:amethyst_imbuement:starter_guide/totem_guide)Totems$()
